name: Instant Pot Vegan Butter Chicken with Soy Curls and Chickpeas - oil-free
description: Instant Pot Vegan Butter Chicken with Soycurls and Chickpeas. 15 minute Active time! 1 Pot Creamy Indian Butter Soy Curls. Use all Chickpeas for soy-free. Vegetarian Gluten-free Recipe. Oil-free Nut-free option

video.name: Instant Pot Vegan Butter Chicken with Soycurls and Chickpeas | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Butter Chicken with Soycurls and Chickpeas. Instant Pot or Skillet. RECIPE: http://www.veganricha.com/2017/10/instant-pot-vegan-butter-chicken.html

15 minute Active time! 1 Pot Creamy Indian Butter Soy Curls, Vegan Murgh Makhani. Use all chickpeas or seitan for soy-free. Vegetarian Gluten-free. Oil-free Nut-free option. Skillet option on the post. Try this easy and Delicious Butter Sauce! Add veggies, chickpeas, tofu or anything else. 

No Butter No Chicken !

GET MY BOOK: http://amzn.to/2npdqH4

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

recipeIngredient: 3  large ripe tomatoes or 1 15 oz can diced tomatoes
1  hot or mild green chile (, I use serrano)
3/4 cup water (, use 1 cup if the tomatoes arent very juicy)
½ tsp paprika or kashmiri chili powder
Cashew cream made with with ¼ cup soaked ( cashews blended with ½ cup water)
1/2 tsp or more sugar or sweetener
1 tsp kasoori methi - dried fenugreek leaves (or add a 1/4 tsp ground mustard)
1/2  moderately hot green chile (finely chopped, or use 2 tbsp finely chopped green bell pepper)
1/2 tsp minced or finely chopped ginger

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the tomatoes, garlic, ginger, chile with water until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the tomatoes, garlic, ginger, chile with water until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add pureed tomato mixture to the Instant pot or pressure cooker.  Add soy curls, chickpeas, spices and salt. Close the lid and press manual/pressure cook for 8 to 10 minutes. (6 minutes for stove top pressure cooker). Quick release after 10 minutes. (See notes for Stove top instructions)
recipeInstructions.name: Add pureed tomato mixture to the Instant pot or pressure cooker.  Add soy curls, chickpeas, spices and salt. Close the lid and press manual/pressure cook for 8 to 10 minutes. (6 minutes for stove top pressure cooker). Quick release after 10 minutes. (See notes for Stove top instructions)

recipeInstructions.text: Start the IP on saute (medium heat for stove top pressure cooker). Add the cashew cream, garam masala, sweetener and fenugreek leaves and mix in. Bring to a boil, taste and adjust salt, heat, sweet. Add more cayenne and salt if needed. Fold in the chopped green chile, ginger and cilantro and press cancel(take off heat).
recipeInstructions.name: Start the IP on saute (medium heat for stove top pressure cooker). Add the cashew cream, garam masala, sweetener and fenugreek leaves and mix in. Bring to a boil, taste and adjust salt, heat, sweet. Add more cayenne and salt if needed. Fold in the chopped green chile, ginger and cilantro and press cancel(take off heat).

recipeInstructions.text: At this point you can add some vegan butter or oil for additional buttery flavor. Serve hot over rice or with flatbread or Naan.
recipeInstructions.name: At this point you can add some vegan butter or oil for additional buttery flavor. Serve hot over rice or with flatbread or Naan.

keywords: butter chickpeas, butter soycurls, indian butter sauce, murgh makhani, vegan butter chicken
